name: Zegeta Video Game
blurb: The Zegeta Video Game is a 2D Retro Style / Action /Adventure / RPG / Platform for iPhone, Mac OSX. $10+ & have a chance to be in the

rewards.reward: Level 1 Sponsor:\r\n\r\nOur DEEPEST GRATITUDE // An EXCLUSIVE BACKER WALLPAPER for DESKTOP, TABLET or MOBILE.

Level 1 Sponsor: 
DOWNLOAD GAME FREE FOR ALL $10+ [MAC OS X, IPHONE, IPAD, IPOD TOUCH, ANDROID, KINDLE FIRE // An EXCLUSIVE BACKER WALLPAPER for DESKTOP, TABLET or MOBILE.

YOU COULD BE ELIGIBLE  FOR MAKING A MISSION WITH YOUR PLAYABLE CHARACTER AND 1 EPIODE OF YOUR STORY
[THE OTHER CONSOLES ARE PENDING]

LEVEL 2 Sponsor:

25 and UP BACKERS WILL HAVE EXCLUSIVE ACCESS TO BEHIND THE GAME DOCUMENTARY
BACKER'S PASSWORD FOR UNLOCKING A MISSION IN THE GAME. // Password to unlock 125,000 VIRTUAL COINS for spending inside the game. // An Exclusive Backer's Wallpaper for Desktop, Tablet or Mobile.

LEVEL 3 Sponsor:\r\n\r\nPassword to unlock 150,000 VIRTUAL COINS for spending inside the game. // BACKER'S PASSWORD FOR UNLOCKING AN EXTRA MISSION IN THE GAME. // An Exclusive Backer's Wallpaper for Desktop, Tablet or Mobile.

LEVEL 4 Sponsor:\r\n\r\nYOUR NAME AS A SPONSOR on the WEBSITE. // Password to unlock 200,000 VIRTUAL COINS for spending inside the game. // BACKER'S PASSWORD FOR UNLOCKING AN EXTRA MISSION IN THE GAME. // An Exclusive Backer's Wallpaper for Desktop, Tablet or Mobile.

LEVEL 5 - SILVER Sponsor:\r\n\r\nYOUR NAME IN VIDEO GAME IN-OS as a SPONSOR. // Password to unlock 350,000 Virtual Coins for spending inside the game. // YOUR NAME AS a SPONSOR on the WEBSITE. // An Exclusive Backer's Wallpaper for Desktop, Tablet or Mobile.

LEVEL 6 - GOLD Sponsor: \r\n\r\nACCESS TO UNRELEASED BETA VERSION for you to test the Mac OS X version and help us make it better. // EXCLUSIVE BACKER'S ZEGETA T-SHIRT.* // Your name as a SPONSOR PREMIUM in the GAME and the WEBSITE. // BETA TESTER CREDITS. // LINK to YOUR COMPANY'S OR PERSONAL WEBSITE on the IN-GAME OS inside the computer (no inappropriate content). // Password to unlock 750,000 VIRTUAL COINS for spending inside the game. // An Exclusive Backer's Wallpaper for Desktop, Tablet or Mobile. *(Please add $15 US. for international shipping).

LEVEL 7 - PLATINUM Sponsor: Your name as Platinum Sponsor in the GAME and the WEBSITE. // YOUR CARTOON IN THE WALK OF SPONSORS INSIDE THE GAME IN A SPECIAL ROOM // AN EXCLUSIVE BACKER'S VIDEO GAME'S POSTER (signed or unsigned by the creator).* // MP3 SOUNDTRACK. // Exclusive Platinum Sponsor Zegeta T-shirt.* // Link of Your Project below your name in the sponsor's section in the Video Game's website. // Password to unlock 1,150,000 VIRTUAL COINS for spending inside the game. // Access to Unreleased Beta Version for you to test the Mac OS X version, and help us better. // Beta Tester Credits. // Link to Your Company's or Personal Website on the In-Game OS inside the computer (no inappropriate content). // An Exclusive Backer's Wallpaper for Desktop, Tablet or Mobile. *(Please add $15 US. for international shipping).

LEVEL 8 - PRODUCER: YOU'LL BE A PRODUCER in the GAME and the WEBSITE. // YOUR CARTOON IN THE WALK OF PRODUCERS WITH BIO WHEN SELECTED INSIDE THE GAME // IN-GAME SIGN NAMED AFTER YOU. It can be a street name or a place mentioned inside the game or in any kind of way that fits. // YOUR BUSINESS AD, PERSONAL PROJECT OR MESSAGE in one of the IN-GAME BILLBOARDS with link to website ON TOUCH (no inappropriate content). // A BOX COPY OF THE GAME for MAC OX (signed or unsigned by the creator).* // YOUR NAME AS A PRODUCER ON THE WEBSITE. // A SPECIAL ANIMATED MESSAGE FROM NICO, post it on your FB wall or website. // AN EXCLUSIVE BACKER'S VIDEO GAME'S POSTER (signed or unsigned by the creator)*. // LINK of YOUR PROJECT below your name in the sponsor's section in the Video Game's website. // Mp3 Soundtrack. // Exclusive PRODUCER Zegeta T-shirt.* // Password to unlock 3,000,000 VIRTUAL COINS for spending inside the game. // Access to Unreleased Beta Version for you to test the Mac OS X version, and help us better. // Beta Tester Credits. // Link to Your Company's or Personal Website on the In-Game OS inside the computer (no inappropriate content). // An Exclusive Backer's Wallpaper for Desktop, Tablet or Mobile. *(Please add $15 US. for international shipping).

LEVEL 9 - ASSOCIATE PRODUCER: YOU'LL BE ASSOCIATE PRODUCER in the GAME and the WEBSITE. // Your Business Ad, Personal Project or Message in one of the In-Game Billboards with link to website on Touch (no inappropriate content). // A Box Copy of The Game for MAC OX (signed or unsigned by the creator).* // A Special Animated Message from NICO, post it on your FB wall or website. // An Exclusive Backer's Video Game's Poster (signed or unsigned by the creator)* // Link of Your Project below your name in the sponsor's section in the Video Game's website. //  Mp3 Soundtrack. // Exclusive ASSOCIATE PRODUCER Zegeta T-shirt.* // Password to unlock 5,000,000 Virtual Coins for spending inside the game. // Access to Unreleased Beta Version for you to test the Mac OS X version, and help us better. // Beta Tester Credits. // Link to Your Company's or Personal Website on the In-Game OS inside the computer (no inappropriate content). // An Exclusive Backer's Wallpaper for Desktop, Tablet or Mobile. *(Please add $15 US. for international shipping).
